hero.title: Your Gateway to Singapore Education Success
hero.subtitle: Affordable, high-quality tuition and exam preparation for AEIS, iPSLE, CEQ, and Cambridge pathways.

about.title: About Candellar
about.mm: Myanmar Office: V5PJ+PRV, Pho Yarzar St, Yangon — AEIS & Singapore exam prep.
about.sg: Singapore Office: 8 Somapah Rd, #01-310, Singapore 487372 — affordable tuition.
about.mission: We provide accessible, credible, skills-based learning to help students succeed in Singapore's education system.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.aeisDesc: Comprehensive preparation for Singapore's entrance examinations
programs.cambridgeDesc: KET, PET, and other Cambridge English certifications
programs.coreDesc: Math, Science, and English for Primary to Secondary levels

why.title: Why Choose Us
why.qualifiedDesc: Passionate educators with proven track records
why.successDesc: Dedicated to your child's academic achievement

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the passionate educators and professionals behind Candellar's success.
team.joinTeamDesc: We're always looking for passionate educators to join our mission of providing quality education.
team.khineBio: Experienced regional manager overseeing operations and strategic initiatives across multiple locations.
team.nyanRole: Head of Sales and Business Development Specialist
team.nyanBio: Strategic leader focused on expanding educational opportunities, building partnerships, and driving business growth.
team.phooRole: Digital Marketing Designer & Marketing and BD
team.phooBio: Creative professional specializing in digital marketing design and business development initiatives.
team.linBio: Expert English educator specializing in PSLE, Singapore Syllabus English, and Cambridge English Qualifications (YLE, KET, PET). Provides systematic guidance for CEQ examinations and AEIS admission preparation.
team.whutBio: TEFL/TESOL certified teacher with over 5 years of experience in CEQ examinations (YLE, KET, PET). Focuses on confidence-building and joyful learning methodologies.
team.htutBio: Mathematics specialist with over 3 years of teaching experience. Specializes in Math Olympiad, Math Prowess Competition, and Genius Competition international mathematics competitions. Focuses on logic thinking, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills.
team.kokoBio: Founded Candellar Myanmar and has been teaching over 300 students annually in Singapore since 2018, from PSLE to O-Level. Successfully led over 200 students through AEIS/S-AEIS examinations. Educated in Singapore from Primary to Junior College, currently pursuing Computer Science at university. Achieved Distinction (excellence) in all subjects across PSLE, O-Level, and A-Level examinations.
team.suzarBio: Marketing strategist focused on spreading awareness about Candellar's educational excellence and building brand recognition.
